department.en: Department of Space Science and Engineering

goal.ch: 太空環境與探測課程涵蓋太空環境科學與太空工程兩大區域，其目標是令學生學習太空船或人造衛星航行之太空環境，以確保太空航行器使用壽命和運作正常。同時藉由太空（衛星）工程和酬載發展，探索太陽、行星際太空、日地環境、近地太空、大氣、海洋、固體地球科學。
goal.en: The Space Environment and Exploration course covers two major areas: space environment science and space engineering. Its goal is to enable students to learn the space environment in which spacecraft or artificial satellites navigate to ensure the service life and normal operation of space vehicles. At the same time, through space (satellite) engineering and payload development, we explore the sun, interplanetary space, solar-terrestrial environment, near-Earth space, atmosphere, ocean, and solid earth science.
